name: Darrell WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wilson v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Darrell WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2004, the appeal is quashed as untimely.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
850 A.2d 618
Darrell WILSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 4, 2004.
